long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
World's Hardest Game 3 is an exhilarating and challenging game that will put your skills and patience to the test. This game, available as a Chrome Extension, can also be played for free on the website https://leveldevil.net/.

In "World's Hardest Game 3," you will navigate through a series of intricate mazes filled with obstacles and enemies. Your objective is to guide a red square to the designated endpoint while avoiding dangerous obstacles and strategically outmaneuvering enemies. The game requires precise timing, quick reflexes, and strategic thinking to successfully complete each level.


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://leveldevil.net/
